title: Implement Cryovant promotion gate
description: Automate ticket review gating with Cryovant signing and promotion flow.
requirements: For each ticket run tests (at minimum python -m unittest subset).
On pass, call Cryovant signing to generate an acceptance artifact (AAT).
Only on valid AAT move ticket to data/work/03_done/ and promote artifact to app/agents/active/ or runtime/ per ticket deliverables.
On fail, log error with failure stage and traceback summary, then move ticket back to data/work/00_inbox/ with notes appended.
acceptance: No artifact promotion occurs without a Cryovant acceptance record.
Gate logs are emitted as AUDIT on success and ERROR on failure.
